conbody.p: This appendix discusses design principles of size-optimized variants of the C standard library, referred to as SmallCLib which provided as part of the MIPS bare metal toolchain and also serves as a technical reference.
SmallCLib is derived from Newlib v2.5 with small influences from Musl v0.9.14.
This appendix enumerates all functional differences in the library as compared with Newlib 2.5.
It is intended to be used in conjunction with Newlib reference documentation provided with the nanoMIPS Bare Metal toolchain under <toolchain-root>/share/doc or available on-line at
conbody.note: SmallCLib is an optional component of .
